reviews.review_text: I was trolling a 4 Lucky Bug plug (Charlies Angel) on a downrigger at 150 feet today near Powell River BC. I hooked into 2 nice Chinook salmon in no time. The hook straightened out a bit so I upgraded it to a bit heavier one. The action on these plugs is great. Ill be trying a couple of the other colors soon.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Jason, Thank you for the review! Glad that you re enjoying these Lucky Plugs. Sorry to hear about the hook straightening out on you. Please reach out to us by email so that I can replace that hook for you. Our email is: info@luckybuglures.com Thanks, Sophie

reviews.review_text: These lures are fantastic!  I use them for rainbow trout and troll them at 1.6 miles/hr at all different levels from surface to 40ft deep.  They work every time!  Highly recommended!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the great recommendation! Im glad that you like our lures. Tight lines and stay in touch.
